CxxWrap.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    CxxWrap.@initcxx — Macro.

    @initcxx

    Initialize the C++ pointer tables in a precompiled module using CxxWrap. Must be called from within __init__ in the wrapped module

    CxxWrap.@readmodule — Macro.

    @readmodule libraryfile [functionname]

    Read a C++ module and associate it with the Julia module enclosing the macro call.

    CxxWrap.@safe_cfunction
    CxxWrap.@wrapfunctions — Macro.

    @wrapfunctions

    Wrap the functions defined in the C++ side of the enclosing module. Requires that @readmodule and @wraptypes was called first.

    CxxWrap.@wrapmodule — Macro.

    @wrapmodule libraryfile [functionname]

    Place the functions and types from the C++ lib into the module enclosing this macro call Calls an entry point named define_julia_module, unless another name is specified as the second argument.

    CxxWrap.@wraptypes — Macro.

    @wraptypes

    Wrap the types defined in the C++ side of the enclosing module. Requires that @readmodule was called first.

    Base class for smart pointers

    CxxWrap.SmartPointerWithDeref — Type.

    Concrete smart pointer implementation. PT is a hash for the pointer type.

    CxxWrap.gcprotect — Function.

    Protect a variable from garbage collection by adding it to the global array kept by CxxWrap

    CxxWrap.gcunprotect — Function.

    Unprotect a variable from garbage collection by removing it from the global array kept by CxxWrap
